title: Sriram Krishnan: The Indian-American 'helping' Elon Musk run Twitter
description: Who is Sriram Krishnan, the India-born tech expert who is reportedly in Elon Musk's "inner circle"?

title: Instagram debuts new age-verification tools in UK and EU
description: Users changing their date of birth to that of an adult can upload a video of themselves to prove their age.

title: Ten days of Twitter chaos
description: Elon Musk's first week-and-a-half at Twitter has been a rollercoaster of big changes.

title: Facebook owner Meta expected to announce major job losses
description: The company faces difficult economic conditions and is investing heavily in its metaverse push.

title: 'It's so liberating': The people quitting social media
description: A small but growing number of people are giving up the likes of Facebook, Twitter and Instagram.
